body:
So yeah, if this thread is against any rule, please lock it.

Are there any gold nova players which want to play competitive with me? My team always looses because of bad organisation etc... It's really getting annoying! Please add my steam here.

It would be great to have an Avicus CS:GO team, so we can play other games together as a community.


CS-Team list:

-AtDiT (Atdit) Current Rank: Gold Nova 3 | Rank 3
-ColeCrc (TenBucksOfMoney) Current Rank: Gold Nova 1 | 
-Cory Baxter (Glitchy1) Current Rank: Gold Nova 3 | Rank 3
-AuroraLight (Emmaye) Current Rank: Gold Nova 2 | Rank 2
-
-JJThatGuy (Enflaming) Current Rank: unranked
-
-

replies.body:
No offence, just getting kills doesn't mean you're good. To play competetive with Gold Novas and higher, you have to be able to carry a team of unranked. It gets hard there. You gotta play your money right, have a good strategy, and do your damn hardest not to die.

Edit: Oh, and people get pissed off if people with 50 hours play competetive. They say that it's not enough.
